articles.title: Oil Rises as Trump Says India Will Stop Buying Russian Supply - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Oil rose from a five-month low after US President Donald Trump said Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi had vowed to halt purchases of Russian barrels, a move that could squeeze global supply.
articles.content:
Oil rose from a five-month low after US President Donald Trump said Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi had vowed to halt purchases of Russian barrels, a move that could squeeze global supply.
